talk1010: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>*sigh* Do you have to do that here?
talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>It's the end of the world, so I don't really
care what happens to any of you, but...

If you're ever lost, just look to the sky.


Do that, and you'll see that eyesore of a
<clr:0000>lighthouse<clr:ffff> shining like a star of salvation.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh>Life's about living, and you only get one
shot at it. So don't go dropping dead on
me, voe.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>Are you finished? I wish you would do
that somewhere else next time...
talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>You're going out in the searing daylight?
Bah. I hope you've got some <clr:0000>chilly food<clr:ffff>
with you, at least.
talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Are you heading into the desert? Bah.
I hope you've got some <clr:0000>spicy food <clr:ffff>with
you, at least.
talk1014:
You're free to use the <clr:0000>pot<clr:ffff> over there,
just keep it tidy. I hate when I have to
clean that thing.
GreetingBefore03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq...<sp:5:0:0> How about it? These are all
pretty rare to you folk, right?

Why not buy them all up now?
talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You think so too, don't you, voe?


But I guess anyone who brazenly strolls
into a place like this doesn't care whether
they live or die, anyway.
talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The end of the world wouldn't be such
a bad thing...if it didn't interfere with
my business.
Buy something before you drop dead in
front of me.
talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh>To think that eyesore of a <clr:0000>lighthouse<clr:ffff>
could shine like a star of salvation.

This really must be the end of the world.
talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>First the sand shroud, then the monsters,<sp:5:0:0>
and now the young'uns are going around
spouting that annoying slang...
If it weren't for the storm clearing up, I'd
say for sure it was the end of the world.
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>What is that? <sp:5:0:0>Whatever it is, I don't deal
in it.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Do all Hylians sell the clothes off their
backs? I know it's annoying, but take
that off before selling it to me!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you sure you don't want more?
I don't mind if you buy everything.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You're disrupting my business, Yiga.<sp:5:0:0>
Get lost.
talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>First the sand shroud, and now monsters?
<sp:5:0:0>And all the young'uns are going around
using that obnoxious slang too...
This must be what the end of the world
looks like.
talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I just don't want anyone to drop dead
right in front of me. That'll give me
some nasty dreams.
Anyway, if you need any of this stuff,
I'll sell it to you. Why not buy it all?
It'd make my life easier.
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Don't tell me you have more to sell...
talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You think so too, don't you, voe?


But I guess anyone who brazenly strolls
into a place like this doesn't care whether
they live or die, anyway.
talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>What is it about this place that draws all
these daredevils?
talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>First the sand shroud, <sp:5:0:0>then the monsters,<sp:5:0:0>
and now the young'uns are all spouting
that annoying slang...
This must be what the end of the world
looks like.
talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I wanted some pleasant memories to take
with me as I faced the end of the world...

But that insufferable slang shows up in
every single memory. If it gets rid of the
slang, I welcome the world's end.
Com_Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Well? What are you going to sell?
Com_Talk_02c:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Here's your payment.<sp:5:0:0> There anything else
you need?
talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh>Life's about living, and you only get one
shot at it. So don't go dropping dead on
me, voe.
talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're free to use the pot to make some
<clr:0000>spicy food<clr:ffff>, but try not to make a mess.
Cleaning that thing's a real pain.
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Get out of here if you're not gonna
buy anything!
talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're free to use the pot to make some
<clr:0000>chilly food<clr:ffff>, but try not to make a mess.
Cleaning it is a real pain.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>You don't have enough rupees.<sp:5:0:0> *sigh*
Don't tell me you wanna sell something...
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>You can't carry any more...<sp:5:0:0> Isn't there
something you can throw away?
Talk_08: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>I could get used to this.<sp:5:0:0> Sarqso.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad>If you're going to buy from me anyway,
I wish you'd just buy it all.
